description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一，首府为南宁市。位于中南地区，南濒北部湾，与越南接壤。名称起源于宋朝的“广南西路”。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China, with Nanning as its capital. Located in South Central China, it borders the Gulf of Tonkin to the south and Vietnam. Its name originates from the 'Guangnan West Circuit' of the Song Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会书记、广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the Communist Party Committee of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region and the Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议广西壮族自治区委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Guangxi Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广西壮族自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区的人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the People's Congress of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议广西壮族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在广西壮族自治区的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，期间设立了广南西路，成为“广西”名称的起源。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history during which the Guangnan West Circuit was established, becoming the origin of the name 'Guangxi'.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝设立的一个行政区划，是“广西”名称的直接来源。
description.en: An administrative division established during the Song Dynasty, which is the direct source of the name 'Guangxi'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一项基本政治制度，广西僮族自治区依据此制度成立。
description.en: A basic political system of the People's Republic of China, under which the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region was established.

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区的前身，于1958年由广西省改制成立，1965年因“僮”族更名为“壮”族而改名。
description.en: The predecessor of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, established in 1958 through the reorganization of Guangxi Province. It was renamed in 1965 when the 'Zhuang' ethnic group's name was changed from 'Tong' (僮) to 'Zhuang' (壮).

nodes.id: 广西省 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 广西省 (中华人民共和国)
en: Guangxi Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的省级行政区，1958年改制为广西僮族自治区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region in the early days of the People's Republic of China, which was reorganized into the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in 1958.

en: Qin's campaign against the Baiyue tribes

description.zh-cn: 公元前214年，秦朝对岭南百越地区发动的军事征服行动，期间入侵了西瓯和雒越。
description.en: In 214 BC, the Qin Dynasty launched a military conquest against the Baiyue region of Lingnan, invading the Xiou and Luoyue peoples.

description.zh-cn: 古代百越族群的一支，生活在今广西地区，曾被秦朝入侵。
description.en: A branch of the ancient Baiyue peoples who lived in present-day Guangxi and were invaded by the Qin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 古代百越族群的一支，生活在今广西地区，曾被秦朝入侵。
description.en: A branch of the ancient Baiyue peoples who lived in present-day Guangxi and were invaded by the Qin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 原秦朝将领，秦亡后在岭南建立南越国。
description.en: A former Qin Dynasty general who established the Nanyue kingdom in Lingnan after the fall of the Qin.

description.zh-cn: 由秦将赵陀在岭南建立的割据政权。
description.en: A separatist regime established in Lingnan by the Qin general Zhao Tuo.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾于1929至1930年间在广西领导发动百色起义。
description.en: Chinese statesman who led the Baise Uprising in Guangxi between 1929 and 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，曾于1929至1930年间在广西参与领导发动百色起义。
description.en: Chinese military strategist who participated in leading the Baise Uprising in Guangxi between 1929 and 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，曾于1929至1930年间在广西参与领导发动百色起义。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary who participated in leading the Baise Uprising in Guangxi between 1929 and 1930.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平等人在广西领导发动的武装起义，期间创建了红七军和红八军。
description.en: An armed uprising led by Deng Xiaoping and others in Guangxi, during which the Red 7th and Red 8th Armies were created.

description.zh-cn: 在百色起义中创建的中国工农红军部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army created during the Baise Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在龙州起义中创建的中国工农红军部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army created during the Longzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 侵华日军的一支部队，曾在中国抗日战争期间发动桂南会战并攻占广西。
description.en: A unit of the invading Japanese army that launched the Battle of South Guangxi and occupied Guangxi during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间的一场战役，日军攻占了广西。
description.en: A battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War in which the Japanese army occupied Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的广西省，是新桂系军阀的根据地。
description.en: Guangxi Province during the Republic of China era, which was the base of the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支野战部队，曾在第二次国共内战期间发动广西战役。
description.en: A field army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army that launched the Guangxi Campaign during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一场战役，第四野战军攻克了广西。
description.en: A campaign during the Second Chinese Civil War in which the Fourth Field Army conquered Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1959年至1961年期间发生的大规模饥荒，导致广西约93.1万人死亡。
description.en: A widespread famine in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961, which resulted in the deaths of approximately 931,000 people in Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在广西发生的大规模屠杀事件，官方统计死亡人数在10万至15万之间。
description.en: A large-scale massacre that occurred in Guangxi during the Cultural Revolution, with official statistics reporting between 100,000 and 150,000 deaths.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈刚自2024年12月起担任中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会书记。
description.en: Chen Gang has served as the Secretary of the Communist Party Committee of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region since December 2024.

relationships.target: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈刚自2025年1月起担任广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chen Gang has served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region since January 2025.

relationships.target: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 韦韬自2025年7月起担任广西壮族自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: Wei Tao has served as the Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region since July 2025.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 孙大伟自2021年1月起担任中国人民政治协商会议广西壮族自治区委员会主席。
description.en: Sun Dawei has served as the Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Guangxi Committee since January 2021.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝将广南路分为广南东路和广南西路。
description.en: The Song Dynasty divided the Guangnan Circuit into Guangnan East Circuit and Guangnan West Circuit.

description.zh-cn: “广西”的名称起源于宋朝设立的“广南西路”。
description.en: The name 'Guangxi' originates from the 'Guangnan West Circuit' established during the Song Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 广西僮族自治区是根据民族区域自治制度改制成立的。
description.en: The Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region was established through reorganization based on the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

relationships.source: 广西省 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 1958年，广西省改制成立广西僮族自治区。
description.en: In 1958, Guangxi Province was reorganized and established as the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 1965年，因僮族更名为壮族，广西僮族自治区随之改为广西壮族自治区。
description.en: In 1965, the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region was renamed from the Guangxi Tong Autonomous Region following the renaming of the Tong ethnic group to the Zhuang ethnic group.

description.zh-cn: 公元前214年，秦朝在征服百越的过程中大举入侵西瓯。
description.en: In 214 BC, the Qin Dynasty launched a major invasion of Xiou during its conquest of the Baiyue.

description.zh-cn: 公元前214年，秦朝在征服百越的过程中大举入侵雒越。
description.en: In 214 BC, the Qin Dynasty launched a major invasion of Luoyue during its conquest of the Baiyue.

description.zh-cn: 秦亡后，秦将赵陀在岭南建立南越国。
description.en: After the fall of the Qin Dynasty, the Qin general Zhao Tuo established the Nanyue kingdom in Lingnan.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是百色起义的领导人之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was one of the leaders of the Baise Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 张云逸是百色起义的领导人之一。
description.en: Zhang Yunyi was one of the leaders of the Baise Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 陈豪人是百色起义的领导人之一。
description.en: Chen Haoren was one of the leaders of the Baise Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 百色起义创建了红七军。
description.en: The Baise Uprising created the Red 7th Army.

description.zh-cn: 百色、龙州起义创建了红八军。
description.en: The Baise and Longzhou Uprisings created the Red 8th Army.

description.zh-cn: 1939年，日本支那派遣军发动桂南会战，攻占广西。
description.en: In 1939, the Japanese China Expeditionary Army launched the Battle of South Guangxi, occupying Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 1939年桂南会战期间，日军攻占了广西。
description.en: During the Battle of South Guangxi in 1939, the Japanese army occupied Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，第四野战军发动广西战役。
description.en: In 1949, the Fourth Field Army launched the Guangxi Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，第四野战军在广西战役中攻克广西，结束了中华民国在广西的统治。
description.en: In 1949, the Fourth Field Army conquered Guangxi in the Guangxi Campaign, ending the rule of the Republic of China in Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 1959年至1961年的三年大饥荒导致广西饿死93.1万人。
description.en: The Great Famine from 1959 to 1961 caused 931,000 deaths by starvation in Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年的广西文革屠杀是全国文革屠杀最惨烈的地区之一，官方统计死亡人数在10万至15万之间。
description.en: The Guangxi Massacre from 1966 to 1976 was one of the most severe during the Cultural Revolution nationwide, with official statistics reporting between 100,000 and 150,000 deaths.
